mapper.select: SELECT a.id, a.mchnt_cd, a.discount_mode, a.param1, a.param2, b.discount_mode r_discount_mode, b.param1 r_param1, b.param2 r_param2, b.param3 r_param3, b.param4 r_param4 FROM tbl_bkms_discount_time_config_inf a LEFT JOIN tbl_bkms_discount_rule_config_inf b ON a.mchnt_cd = b.mchnt_cd AND a.discount_mode = b.discount_mode WHERE a.mchnt_cd = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY a.discount_mode
mapper.insert:

(#{item.mchntCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.discountMode,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.param1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.param2,jdbcType=INTEGER})

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
